FuncDef:
The if-match acl command sets an ACL-based filtering rule.
The undo if-match acl command cancels the configuration. The if-match acl command sets an ACL-based filtering rule. The undo if-match acl command cancels the configuration. By default, no ACL-based filtering rule is set.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the number of a basic ACL.
The value is an integer ranging from 2000 to 2999.

Specifies the name of a named basic ACL.
The value is a string of 1 to 32 case-sensitive characters without spaces. The value must start with a letter or digit, and cannot contain only digits.

ExtraInfo: To set an ACL-based filtering rule, run the if-match acl command.
